ACCOUNT_ID.description: Your **Cloudflare Account ID**. Find this in your Cloudflare dashboard sidebar.

GATEWAY_ID.description: Your **AI Gateway name/ID**. Create one in `Workers & AI` â†’ `AI Gateway` if you don't have one yet.

VERTEX_PROJECT.description: **Optional**: Google Cloud project name. Only required if you plan to use Vertex AI models like `vertex/gemini-1.5-pro`.

VERTEX_REGION.description: **Optional**: Google Cloud region (e.g., `us-east4`). Only required for Vertex AI models.
